newsitem.title: USA: American Interactive names Yunich CEO.
newsitem.headline: American Interactive names Yunich CEO.

text.p: American Interactive Media Inc said on Wednesday it named Peter Yunich as the company's first chief executive officer and chairman of the board.
Yunich was most recently president of Viacom Inc's Simon & Schuster Interactive, American Interactive said.
Operations at American Interactive started at the beginning of the summer of 1996, a spokesman said.
